title: Scale property not working
body: Setting "scale" in the config for either default or groups does not change the size of the displays
author: bumpyJake

comments.body:
@bumpyJake please make sure the scale key is a section with the fields `x`, `y` and `z`.

```yml
defaults:
  # ...
  scale:
    x: 1.5
    y: 1.5
    z: 1.5
```

Ahh I wasn't aware you had to specify x y z, thank you!

Also question, would it ever be possible to have different scale properties for different lines?

You'd have to use the api for that and do it yourself, I don't currently plan on adding it, sorry.

Passengers in minecraft are messy enough as it is, so you can either use a texture pack or the api, but I won't be adding it myself for the time being.
